title: [:snoo_feelsgoodman: General Discussion] $ACVT pumping on a consideration of selling a portion or all of its business. Opened close to its 52 week low of $.132 at $.1463. $REV pumped from $1.95 to $9.89 on a buyout rumour for a 5 bagger. $ACVT has 15% SI with a 44% CTB. $REV was over 30% SI at the time.
